name: "Sweet Dreams"
description: A finely crafted furnishing with movable parts at its base, featuring yumekui-baku figurines that twirl to a cheerful rhythm. They say that yumekui-baku can devour all nightmares, and that their soothing melodies help people drift into a peaceful slumber. Perhaps placing this in your bedroom will bring you sweet dreams too.\nDon't stare at the spinning yumekui-baku for too long, though â€” you'll probably end up feeling rather dizzy!
